places.group1.name: Gate 1, 2, 3
places.group1.instruction: Go straight to the left 125m, then turn left for another 5m, the door down is on the left.

places.group1.name: Gate 4, 5
places.group1.instruction: Go straight to the left for 40m, then turn right for another 10m, the door down to the gate is on the left.

places.group1.name: Smoking room
places.group1.instruction: Go straight to the left 110m, the smoking room is on the left, opposite the Crystal Jade Kitchen.

places.group1.name: Men's restroom
places.group1.instruction: Go straight to the left for 60m, the men's restroom is on the left.

places.group1.name: Women's restroom
places.group1.instruction: Go straight to the left 45m, the women's restroom is on the left.

places.group1.name: Sun Coast Lounge
places.group1.instruction: Sun Coast Lounge is located on the left, right next to Crystal Jade Kitchen.

places.group1.name: Value Added Tax Refund Counter - Vietinbank
places.group1.instruction: Go straight left for 30m, the tax refund counter is on the right.

places.group2.name: Gate 6, 7
places.group2.instruction: Go straight to the right 40m, then turn left to go another 10m.

places.group2.name: Gate 8, 9, 10
places.group2.instruction: Go straight to the right 125m, then turn right to go another 5m.

places.group2.name: Smoking room
places.group2.instruction: Go straight to the right 110, the smoking room is located on the right, opposite Burger King.

places.group2.name: Women's restroom
places.group2.instruction: Go straight to the right 45m, the women's restroom is on the right.

places.group2.name: Men's restroom
places.group2.instruction: Go straight to the right 60m, the men's restroom is on the right.

places.group2.name: Lotus Lounge
places.group2.instruction: Go straight to the right 118m, Lotus Lounge is on the left, right next to Burger King.

places.group2.name: Medical room
places.group2.instruction: Go straight to the right 120m, then turn left for another 5m.

stores.name: Lotte Duty Free – Cosmetic
stores.instruction: Go straight, 6m ahead.

stores.name: Lotte Duty Free – Fashion
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 30m, the store is on the right side

stores.name: Lotte Duty Free – Watch & Jewelry
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 30m, the store is on the left.

stores.name: Long Beach Pearl
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 65m, shop on the left.

stores.name: Qmart
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 130m, turn left, go down to the airport lobby (doors 1-2-3) or right, go straight 130m, turn right to go down to the airport lobby (gates 8- 9- 10).

stores.name: Vietnam's Delight
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 50m, the store is on the left; or turn left, go straight 50m, the store is on the right.

stores.name: 19 islands
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 40m, turn right, go another 7m, go down the stairs, go another 30m.

stores.name: Viet House
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 40m, turn left, go another 7m, go down the stairs, go straight another 30m

stores.name: Souvenir and Special Food Shop
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 50m, the store is on the left

stores.name: Relaxing House Spa
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 40m, then turn right, go straight another 10m.

stores.name: Made in Vietnam
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 40m, then turn left and go 7m, down the stairs, the store is on the right. Or turn right, go straight 130m, the store is on the left

stores.name: Vietnamese Gift Shop
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 55m, the store is on the left

stores.name: Yen Store
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 85m, the store is on the left; or turn left, go straight 85m, the store is on the right.

stores.name: Lan Anh Shop
stores.instruction: On the left, go straight 65m, the shop on the right.

stores.name: Vietnamese Specialities
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 40m, then turn right, go down the stairs, the store is located in the airport lobby, doors 4-5. Or turn left, go straight 130m, then turn left, go down the stairs, the store is located in the airport lobby, door number 1-2-3.

stores.name: Lucky Gift Shop
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 65m, the store is on the left; or turn left, go straight 65m, the store is on the right.

stores.name: Nha Trang Specialities
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 55m, the store is on the right.

stores.name: Gourmet Viet
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 50m, the store is on the right.

stores.name: Happy Shopping
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 130m, then turn left, go down the stairs, the store is located in the airport lobby, door number 1-2-3.

stores.name: Burger King
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 100m, the store is on the left.

stores.name: Presto Food and Drink
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 105m, shop on the left.

stores.name: Yen Restaurant
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 130m, the store is on the right.

stores.name: Food and Drink
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 105m, shop on the right.

stores.name: Vietnamese Food & Drink
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 130m, the store is on the left.

stores.name: Your Vietnam
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 130m, then turn right, go down the stairs, the store is located in the departure lounge, doors 8-9-10.

stores.name: Puro Gusto
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 100m, the store is on the right.

stores.name: Coffee
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 100m, the shop is on the left

stores.name: Star Cafe
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 40m, then turn left, down the stairs; or turn left, go straight 40m, then turn right, down the stairs. The store is located in the airport lobby, doors 4-5 and doors 6-7

stores.name: Crystal Jade
stores.instruction: Turn left, go straight 100m, the store is on the right.

stores.name: Taha-ka
stores.instruction: Turn right, go straight 130m, then turn right, down the stairs. The store is located in the airport lobby, door number 1-2-3.
